sign-in-message: Sign in to access an enhanced shopping experience.
profile-message: View and update your profile information, including your name, email, and phone number. You can also update your billing address, or change your password.
name: Name
error-message: An error occurred, please try again
shipping-addresses-message: View and update your shipping addresses, you can add as many as you like. Saving your addresses will make them available during checkout.
orders-message: View your previous orders and their status. You can also create returns or exchanges for your orders if needed.
you-dont-have-orders: You don't have any orders yet, let us change that
questions-message: You can find frequently asked questions and answers on our customer service page.
email-sent: We've just sent you an email to the address linked with your account.
click-link: Click on the link inside to complete the activation of your account.
cant-locate-email: If you can't locate it in your inbox, please wait a few minutes, check your spam folder or retry again.
cant-find-email: If you can't locate it in your inbox, please wait a few minutes or retry again.
enter-email: Enter your email address below. We will send you an email with a link to follow.
sign-in-with-new-password: You can sign in with your email and new password.
enter-new-password: Enter your new password in the form below.
email-activate-account: We sent you an email with instructions for activating your account
create-khrt-profile: Create your KHRT Store Member profile, and get access to an enhanced shopping experience.
you-agree: By creating an account, you agree to KHRT Store's
